data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The climate varies from tropical to temperate, with arid conditions in the coastal south. There ____ a ____ season ____ frequent ____ due ____ heavy ____, ____ a ____ season ____ significantly ____ rainfall ____ none ____ all. There are four distinct seasons: a cool, dry winter from December through February; a hot, dry spring from March through May; the summer rainy season, or southwest monsoon period, from June through September; and the retreating monsoon period of October and November.

There are four distinct seasons: a cool, dry winter from December through February; a hot, dry spring from March through May; the summer rainy season, or southwest monsoon period, from June through September; and the retreating monsoon period of October and November.
data.fullContent: The climate varies from tropical to temperate, with arid conditions in the coastal south. There is a monsoon season with frequent flooding due to heavy rainfall, and a dry season with significantly less rainfall or none at all. There are four distinct seasons: a cool, dry winter from December through February; a hot, dry spring from March through May; the summer rainy season, or southwest monsoon period, from June through September; and the retreating monsoon period of October and November.
data.answer: 气候从热带到温带不同，南部沿海地区干旱。有时候是雨季，有大量的降水；有时候是干季，降雨量少或根本没有降雨。这里有四个不同的季节:从12月到2月是凉爽干燥的冬天;从3月到5月是炎热干燥的春天; 6月到9月是夏天的雨季，或西南季风期 ;以及10月和11月的季风消退期。
